data.title: Healthcare Communication and Infrastructure Solutions
data.text:
As a certified Gold Partner with Cisco, Black Box Resale Services can offer dramatic savings on refurbished networking and telephony gear. If you are looking to upgrade your system, the performance of genuine Cisco routers, switches and other equipment cannot be beat. Talk to your sales representative about the Cisco Certified Refurbished advantage, or click HERE to learn more.
